description:
MAD TRIGGER CREW and Dotsuitare Honpo arrive in a new area and fall into TBH`s trap. The two teams are shown footage of Samatoki`s younger sister, Rosho`s student, and Rio`s former commanding officer. Only one can be saved. Who will the teams choose?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Each of Us Bears His Own Hell.
Each of Us Bears His Own Hell.
